mapper.insert: insert into app_chat_num(id, app_id, chat_mode, chat_num) values(#{id},#{appId},#{chatMode},1) on conflict(app_id, chat_mode) do update set chat_num = app_chat_num.chat_num + 1
mapper.update: update app_chat_num set chat_num=chat_num - 1 where app_id=#{appId} and chat_mode=#{chatMode}
